data: PED ED Acetylcysteine for Acetaminophen Poisoning
Contact the BC Drug and Poison Information Center 604-682-5050, 1-800-567-8911
Antidote Guidelines for B.C. Hospitals BC Drug and Poison Information Centre
PED ED Peripheral IV and IV Fluids (Module)
1 g/kg, PO, once, drug form: oral liq, first dose: STAT
150 mg/kg, IV, once, drug form: inj
50 mg/kg, IV, once, drug form: inj
100 mg/kg, IV, q16h, drug form: inj
1 mg/kg, IV, once, PRN other (see comment), drug form: inj
